alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 14 at 2:43AM CST until January 16 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM MONDAY TO 7 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Hamilton County. * WHEN...From 1 AM Monday to 7 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Most of the precipitation is forecast to fall as snow, but periods of mixed precipitation will be possible near the Georgia state line which may produce light icing and limit snowfall totals in these areas.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
